text: Joynal Abedin is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Meherpur-1. ==Career== Abedin was elected to parliament from Meherpur-1 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 2008. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:9th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Joynal Abedin (politician, born 1954)
